message.content:
{"id": "6536", 
"title": "Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing", 
"description": "When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens. The option to add Javadoc should either be removed from the context menu or, preferably, the action should actually add the Javadoc to the field.", 
"OB": "Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.", 
"EB": "From the context menu of the selected field, select 'Add Javadoc'. Currently, nothing happens when this option is selected. The expected behavior is that the Javadoc for the field should be added.", 
"SR": "1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 
2. Select a field in the view."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6536', 'title': 'Bug 6536Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'From its context menu select "Add Javadoc"== nothing happens.Either this menu should be removed or (preferably) the action should add thefields Javadoc. ', 'SR': 'Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view2. '}
